name: aeration
content:

a process that allows air to act on something: Garden worms help with soil drainage and aeration. Digging helps the aeration of the soil.
the addition of a gas to a liquid: The waterfall increases aeration of the pond water. They serve a coffee parfait with perfect aeration. See
aerate
More examplesFewer examplesKeeping the rice fields damp but not flooded improved soil aeration.If you beat the batter well to increase aeration, it will result in a light, moist cake.Large, open areas are expected to improve aeration of the lake water.Your pond may need a fountain, waterfall, or other aeration device.
